Title: Establishes fetal and infant mortality review boards
Summary: Establishes fetal and infant mortality review boards to study fetal and infant mortality and morbidity and make recommendations on policies, best practices, and strategies to reduce fetal and infant mortality and morbidity.
LawCode: Add ยง2509-b, Pub Health L; add ยง17-166.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing fetal and infant mortality review boards
